titles.title: A bill to increase the fee for the enforcement of the Tea Importation Act, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S10000-10001)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

bill.summary: 7/30/1993--Introduced. Amends the Tea Importation Act to prohibit examination of tea for importation into the United States, or its release by the Customs Services, unless the importer or consignee has paid a fee equal to the lesser of: (1) ten cents for each hundred weight or fraction thereof of the tea; or (2) the cost of the examination.
